item.title: yarn3-hugo Project Template
item.description: yarn3-hugo Project Template I’ve added a new project template to quickly set up a Hugo-based website, like this blog. Get Started To use this template, go to https://github.com/oliversalzburg/yarn3-hugo and click Use this template.
